original_text:
Let them extol him in the congregation of the people,
    and praise him in the assembly of the elders.
korean_text: 백성의 모임에서 그를 높이며 장로들의 자리에서 그를 찬송할지로다

sentences.original_text: Let them extol him in the congregation of the people
sentences.korean_translation: 백성의 회중에서 그를 높이 찬양하게 하라

sentences.original_text: and praise him in the assembly of the elders.
